headline: A Look At Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Valuation As It Revamps Its AI Era Partner Program
summary: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) just rolled out a major refresh of its NextWave Partner Program, putting platform based, AI era security outcomes at the center and tying partner rewards more tightly to higher margin services. See our latest analysis for Palo Alto Networks. The recent refresh of the partner program lands after a sharp reset in sentiment, with Palo Alto Networks’ 30 day share price return of 16.73% and 90 day return of 27.09% pointing to fading short term momentum, even as the 3 year...
